text: xo sraththa chn thanghlay! Phwk cea cng pliktaw hı phn cak swn hıy khxng kar sngsay thæcring kar sngsay bang xyang nan pen bap læa phwk cea xya sxdnæm læa bang khnnı hmu phwk cea xya nintha sung kanlæakan khn hnung nı hmu phwk cea nan chxb thi ca kin neux phinxng khxng khea thi tay pi læwk ra nan hrux? Phwk cea yxm keliyd man læa cng ya ke rng xallxhˌ theid thæ cring xallxhˌ nan pen phuthrng xphaythosʹ phuthrng metta semx
